name: SpotInstancePrices
0:
”Alexa, ask spot instance prices to give me current spot prices”
”Alexa ask spot instance prices what are best prices”
”Alexa, ask spot instance prices to give me best spot prices”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spot instance prices
des:
This skill is designed to provide information about the best prices for c4.8xlarge and cc2.8xlarge spot instances.

Regions with the 3 lowest prices will be returned.

Warning: When spotting an instance, be sure to always provide a maximum price.

In future version, we plan to let you chose instance type and return spot prices for them.
